Summarize.prompt:
Input Text:
 '{input_text}' 

 Maximum Number Of Words: {option} 
Task: 
Please provide a summary of the input text in the same input text language withMaximum of words as specified.

Expand.prompt:
Input Text:
"{input_text}"

Maximum Number Of Expanded Approximate Line: {option}

Task:
Please expand the given input text by adding more details, explanations, and relevant information with same tone.
Ensure that the expanded text are (Maximum Number Of Expanded Approximate Lines = {option})
comprehensive and provides a deeper understanding of the topic
and make it in the same input text language ONLY and dont insert any language to the results.

Check Grammar/Spelling.prompt:
User Input Text:
{input_text}
Return Template:
[Corrected Text]

AI Task:
Check And Correct The Grammar and Spelling in the same Language and Return the correct one

Arrange In Steps.prompt:
User Input Text:
    {input_text}

    Max Number of Steps:
    {option}

    Return Template:
    1- arranged text.
    2- another one.
    3- and so on.

    AI Task:
    Arrange the user input text in steps in the same language 
    with respect of max number of Steps as specified and you can make them in lower than this number as you can
    and Give me the steps only

Arrange In Blots.prompt:
User Input Text:
    {input_text}

    Max Number of Dot Blots:
    {option}
    
    Return Template:
    • Summarized arranged text.
    • Summarized another one.
    • and so on.

    AI Task:
    Summarize and Arrange the user input text in dot blots in the same language 
    with respect of max number of Dot Blots as specified and you can make them in lower than this number as you can
    and Give me the dot blots only

Suitable Title.prompt:
User Input Text:
    {input_text}

    Desired Tone of Voice:
    {option}
    
    Return Template:
    suitable title

    AI Task:
    Extract The Suitable Title for the User Input Text 
    with respect the Desired Tone of Voice as provided

Extract Keywords.prompt:
your task is to extract keywords from the input text
TEXT:
{input_text}

with Max Number Keywords you can extract: {option} only

Return:
only keywords in separated with comma only and dont return other text before it.

Extract HashTags.prompt:
I have a user input text, and I need you to generate a list of the most relevant and effective hashtags based on its content. The hashtags should capture the main themes, keywords, and topics to maximize visibility and engagement on social media.

Input Text:
{input_text}

Please provide up to Max {option} unique and concise hashtags that are popular and contextually appropriate for the given text.
Make sure the hashtags are varied and target different aspects of the content where possible. 

you must return only the hashtags.
